topic.title: Las Vegas shooter - Jewish controlled Deep State and Antifa connection
topic.body:
Las Vegas shooter - possible connection to the Jewish controlled Deep State and Antifa
http://www.newsweek.com/alex-jones-deep-state-behind-las-vegas-attack-676016

Stephen Paddock, the Las Vegas shooter, was an Antifa member who was also linked with ISIS, according to an FBI agent involved in his death.
Stephen Paddock, the Las Vegas shooter, was an Antifa member who was also linked with ISIS, according to an FBI agent involved in storming the 64-year-old domestic terroristâ€™s hotel room.
Contrary to mainstream media reports, the Las Vegas shooter did not commit suicide after firing bullets into the crowd, but was actually killed by FBI agents, who also found Antifa literature after they stormed his room, according to FBI sources.
